t: A major bike brand is now selling on Amazon
s: May 1, 2025 - German bike brand Canyon is now selling select bikes to US customers via Amazon. The company, known for selling bicycles directly to consumers all over the world, is now offering many of their popular mountain bike models on the site, including the Spectral and Stoic.

t: You can now buy Canyon bikes on Amazon in the US as German brand becomes the first major bike manufacturer to list on the platform | Cyclingnews
s: May 2, 2025 - American buyers can now buy a Canyon mountain bike, urban bike or electric bike on Amazon, will road and gravel bikes follow?
